verbs.description: ionia court [V: has] to reconsider life sentence for teen convicted of 80-year - old murder billie cunningham death was originally ruled accidental but investigators re - classified the death as a homicide following her family dogged insistence that it was no mere mishap billie cunningham murder michigan state police ionia court justin dewayne stephens
